title: Corporate Headquarters
desc:
Rent: $800

Stop-In Effects:
- When the owner stops on the Corporate Headquarters, they may purchase houses or hotels for any of their properties, even if they don't own the whole set.

Attributes:
- Whenever the owner gains property (either by purchase or trading), gain +200$ for each property gained.
- Gain an additional +250$ whenever the owner passes the starting space.
